description: The way to combat magic, or even nullify it.
name: antimagic

talents.info_text:
You stand in the way of magical damage. That which does not kill you will make you stronger.

Each time you are hit by non-physical, non-mind damage, you get a 27%, 37%, 45%, 52%, 57% resistance to that element for 7 turns.

If Antimagic Shield is not active, you also absorb part of the impact and use it to fuel your own powers, decreasing your equilibrium and increasing your stamina by 1.66, 1.89, 2.08, 2.23, 2.37 each hit.

The effects will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Resolve

talents.info_text:
Let out a burst of sound that silences for 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns all those affected in a radius of 6, 9, 11, 13, 14, including the user.

The silence chance will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Aura of Silence

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with a shield that will absorb at most 56, 77, 93, 107, 119 non-physical, non-mind element damage per attack.

Each time damage is absorbed by the shield, your equilibrium increases by 1 for every 30 points of damage and a check is made. If the check fails, the shield will crumble and Antimagic Shield will go on cooldown.

The damage the shield can absorb will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Antimagic Shield

talents.info_text:
Drain 351, 478, 576, 660, 734 mana, 175, 239, 288, 330, 367 vim, 87, 119, 144, 165, 183 positive and negative energies from your target, triggering a chain reaction that explodes in a burst of arcane damage.

The damage done is equal to 100% of the mana drained, 200% of the vim drained, or 400% of the positive or negative energy drained, whichever is higher.

The effect will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Mana Clash

description: Be at one with nature.
name: call of the wild

talents.info_text:
Meditate on your link with Nature.

While meditating, you regenerate 10, 13, 16, 18, 20 equilibrium per turn, your Mental Save is increased by 32, 42, 50, 57, 62, and your healing factor increases by 25%, 32%, 38%, 43%, 47%.

Your deep meditation does not, however, let you deal damage correctly, reducing the damage you and your summons deal by 50%.

Also, any time you are resting (even with Meditation not sustained) you enter a simple meditative state that lets you regenerate 0.50, 1.00, 1.50, 2.00, 2.50 equilibrium per turn.

The effects will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Meditation

talents.info_text:
Touch a target (or yourself) to infuse it with Nature, healing it for 402, 541, 648, 740, 820 (this heal does not work on undead).

The amount healed will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Nature's Touch

talents.info_text:
Using your connection to Nature, you can see your surrounding area in a radius of 8, 10, 12, 13, 15.

Also, while meditating, you are able to detect the presence of creatures around you in a radius of 3, 4, 5, 5, 6.
talents.name: Earth's Eyes

talents.info_text: Your deep link with Nature allows you to reset the cooldown of 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 of your wild gifts of tier 1, 3, 4, 6, 8 or less.
talents.name: Nature's Balance

description: Take on the defining aspects of a Cold Drake.
name: cold drake aspect

talents.info_text:
You call upon the mighty claw of a cold drake and rake a wave of freezing cold in front of you, doing 175%, 204%, 227%, 246%, 263% weapon damage as Ice damage in a cone of 1, 2, 2, 3, 3. Ice damage gives a chance of freezing the target.

Every level in Ice Claw additionally raises your Physical, Mental and Spell Saves by 4.

Each point in cold drake talents also increases your cold resistance by 1%.
talents.name: Ice Claw

talents.info_text:
Your skin forms icy scales and your flesh toughens, increasing your Maximum Life by 3%, 6%, 9%, 12%, 15% and your Armour by 16, 23, 27, 31, 35.

You also deal 31, 38, 44, 49, 53 cold damage to any enemies that physically strike you.

Each point in cold drake talents also increases your cold resistance by 1%.

The life increase will scale with your Talent Level, and your Armour and retaliation cold damage will scale with Mindpower.
talents.name: Icy Skin

talents.info_text:
Summons an icy wall of 3, 5, 7, 9, 11 length for 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns. Ice walls are transparent, but block projectiles and enemies.

Ice walls also emit freezing cold, dealing 9.99, 14, 16, 19, 21 damage for each ice wall within radius 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 of an enemy, and with each wall giving a 25% chance to freeze an enemy. This cold cannot hurt the talent user or their allies.

Each point in cold drake talents also increases your cold resistance by 1%.
talents.name: Ice Wall

talents.info_text:
You breathe ice in a frontal cone of radius 5, 7, 8, 9, 10. Any target caught in the area will take 183, 239, 281, 316, 346 cold damage, will be slowed 20% for three turns, and has a 25% to be frozen for a few turns (higher rank enemies will be frozen for a shorter time).

The damage will increase with your Strength, and the critical chance is based on your Mental crit rate.

Each point in cold drake talents also increases your cold resistance by 1%.
talents.name: Ice Breath

description: You channel acid through your psiblades.
name: corrosive blades

talents.info_text:
Channel acid through your psiblades, extending their reach to create a beam doing 217, 296, 357, 409, 454 Acid damage (which can disarm them).

The damage increases with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Acidbeam

talents.info_text:
You gain 27%, 37%, 45%, 52%, 57% Acid resistance.

When you deal Nature damage to a creature, you gain a 3.1%, 4.9%, 6.5%, 8.0%, 9.4% bonus to Acid damage for 2, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns.

This damage bonus will improve up to 4 times (no more than once each turn) with later Nature damage you do, up to a maximum of 6.8%, 11%, 15%, 18%, 21%.

The resistance and damage increase improve with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Corrosive Nature

talents.info_text:
You focus on a target zone of radius 2 to make up to 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 corrosive seeds appear.

The first seed will appear at the center of the target zone, while others will appear at random spots.

Each seed lasts 5, 7, 7, 8, 8 turns and will explode when a hostile creature walks over it, knocking the creature back and dealing 217, 296, 357, 409, 454 Acid damage within radius 1.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Corrosive Seeds

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with natural forces, ignoring 23%, 38%, 48%, 56%, 61% acid resistance of your targets.

In addition, the acid will nurish your bloated oozes, giving them an additional 53, 73, 88, 100, 111 life regeneration per turn.
talents.name: Acidic Soil

description: Unleash nature's fury against foes around you.
name: eyal's fury

talents.info_text:
You focus the inexorable pull of nature against a single creature, eroding it and allowing it to be reclaimed by the cycle of life.

This deals 120, 164, 198, 226, 252 Nature and 120, 164, 198, 226, 252 Acid damage to the target, and is particularly devastating against undead and constructs, dealing 25% more damage to them.

The damage increases with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Reclaim

talents.info_text:
Your devotion to nature has made your body more attuned to the natural world and resistant to unnatural energies.

You gain 34, 47, 57, 65, 73 Spell save, 28%, 38%, 46%, 52%, 58% Arcane resistance, and 8.1%, 15%, 20%, 23%, 26% Nature damage affinity.

You defy arcane forces, so that any time you take damage from a spell, you restore 5.2, 7.1, 8.5, 9.8, 11 Equilibrium each turn for 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The effects increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Nature's Defiance

talents.info_text:
You call upon the earth to create a blinding, corrosive cloud in an area of radius 4 for 6, 8, 9, 10, 11 turns.

Each turn, this cloud deals 50, 68, 81, 93, 104 Acid damage to each foe while (23%, 32%, 39%, 44%, 49% chance) burning away one beneficial magical effect.

The damage increases with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Acidfire

talents.info_text:
You draw deeply from your connection with nature to create a radius 4, 5, 5, 6, 6 storm of natural forces around you for 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

This storm moves with you and deals 72, 98, 118, 135, 150 Nature damage each turn to all foes it hits.

In addtion, it will drain up to 20, 27, 33, 38, 42 Mana, 10, 13, 16, 19, 21 Vim, 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 Positive, and 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 Negative energy from each enemy within it's area every turn, while you restore Equilibrium equal to 10% of the amount drained.

The damage and drain increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Eyal's Wrath

description: Take on the defining aspects of a Fire Drake.
name: fire drake aspect

talents.info_text:
You summon a powerful gust of wind, knocking back your foes within a radius of 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 up to 3 tiles away and damaging them for 138%, 150%, 158%, 166%, 173% weapon damage.

Every level in Wing Buffet additionally raises your Physical Power and Accuracy by 4, passively.

Each point in fire drake talents also increases your fire resistance by 1%.
talents.name: Wing Buffet

talents.info_text:
You let out a powerful roar that sends your foes into utter confusion for 3 turns in a radius of 3, 5, 6, 7, 8.

The sound wave is so strong, your foes also take 143, 187, 220, 247, 271 physical damage.

The damage improves with your Strength.

Each point in fire drake talents also increases your fire resistance by 1%.
talents.name: Bellowing Roar

talents.info_text:
Spit a cloud of flames, doing 42, 58, 69, 79, 88 fire damage in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 each turn for 5, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns.

The flames will ignore the caster, and will drain 10% of the damage dealt as the flames consume enemies life force and transfer it to the user.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower, and can critical.

Each point in fire drake talents also increases your fire resistance by 1%.
talents.name: Devouring Flame

talents.info_text:
You breathe fire in a frontal cone of radius 5, 7, 8, 9, 10. Any target caught in the area will take 232, 302, 355, 398, 436 fire damage over 3 turns, and has a 25% chance of being Flameshocked for 3 turns, stunning them.

The damage will increase with your Strength, and the critical chance is based on your Mental crit rate.

Each point in fire drake talents also increases your fire resistance by 1%.
talents.name: Fire Breath

description: By covering yourself in fungus, you better your healing.
name: fungus

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with a myriad of tiny, nearly invisible, healing fungi.

Any regeneration effect active on you will have its duration increased by +2, +3, +4, +5, +6 turns.
talents.name: Wild Growth

talents.info_text:
Improve your fungus to allow it to take a part of any healing you receive and improve it.

Each time you are healed, you get a regeneration effect for 6 turns that heals you for 57%, 63%, 67%, 69%, 71% of the direct heal you received.

The effect will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Fungal Growth

talents.info_text:
Your fungus can reach into the primordial ages of the world, granting you ancient instincts.

Each time a regeneration effect is used on you, you gain 88%, 102%, 112%, 122%, 130% of a turn.

Also, regeneration effects on you will decrease your equilibrium by 1.4, 2.3, 2.9, 3.5, 4.0 each turn.

The turn gain increases with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Ancestral Life

talents.info_text: A wave of energy passes through your fungus, making it release immediate healing energies on you, healing you for 660%, 819%, 980%, 1140%, 1200% of your current life regeneration rate.
talents.name: Sudden Growth

description: Nature heals and cleans you.
name: harmony

talents.info_text:
The waters of life flow through you, purifying any poisons or diseases currently affecting you.

For 6, 8, 9, 11, 12 turns, all poisons and diseases will heal you instead of damaging you.

When activated, it also heals you for 26, 35, 41, 46, 51 life for each disease or poison you have.

The healing per disease/poison will increase with your Willpower.
talents.name: Waters of Life

talents.info_text:
Befriend the natural elements that constitute nature. Each time you are hit by one of the elements, you gain a special effect for 7, 8, 9, 10, 11 turns. This can only happen every 7, 8, 9, 10, 11 turns.

Fire: +20%, +31%, +40%, +48%, +56% global speed

Cold: +6, +9, +12, +15, +19 Armour

Lightning: +1, +3, +4, +6, +8 to all stats

Acid: +8.20, +11, +15, +18, +21 life regen

Nature: +7%, +9%, +11%, +13%, +16% to all resists
talents.name: Elemental Harmony

talents.info_text: Commune with nature, removing the infusion saturation effect and reducing the cooldown of 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 infusions by 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 turns.
talents.name: One with Nature

talents.info_text:
A wave of natural energies flow around you in a radius of 2;, 3;, 4;, 5;, 6; all creatures hit will suffer from the Healing Nexus status for 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

While under the effect, all healing done to the creature will instead heal you for 56%, 72%, 88%, 104%, 120% of the heal value (and no healing at all goes to the target).

Each heal leeched will also restore 6, 8, 9, 11, 13 equilibrium.
talents.name: Healing Nexus

description: Take on the aspects of aged and powerful dragons.
name: higher draconic abilities

talents.info_text:
Unleash raw, chaotic elemental damage upon your enemy.

You strike your enemy for 165%, 184%, 198%, 210%, 221% weapon damage in one of blinding sand, disarming acid, freezing and slowing ice, dazing lightning or stunning flames, with equal odds.

Additionally, you will cause a burst that deals 171, 233, 280, 321, 357 of that damage to enemies in radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4, regardless of if you hit with the blow.

Levels in Prismatic Slash increase your Physical and Mental attack speeds by 3%, 7%, 9%, 11%, 13%.
talents.name: Prismatic Slash

talents.info_text:
You breathe crippling poison in a frontal cone of radius 5, 7, 8, 9, 10. Any target caught in the area will take 44, 57, 67, 75, 83 nature damage each turn for 6 turns.

The poison also gives enemies a 12%, 17%, 20%, 23%, 25% chance to fail actions more complicated than basic attacks and movement, while it is in effect.

The damage will increase with your Strength, and the critical chance is based on your Mental crit rate.

Each point in Venomous Breath also increases your nature resistance by 3%, and your nature damage by 4%.
talents.name: Venomous Breath

talents.info_text:
You have the mental prowess of a Wyrm.

Your Cunning is increased by 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, and your breath attack cooldowns are reduced by 2, 5, 5, 6, 6.

You gain 24%, 39%, 48%, 56%, 61% knockback resistance, and your blindness and stun resistances are increased by 10%, 17%, 24%, 29%, 34%.
talents.name: Wyrmic Guile

talents.info_text:
You have gained the full power of the multihued dragon, and your mastery over the elements is complete.

Increases physical, fire, cold, lightning and acid damage by 2%, 4%, 6%, 8%, 10%, and your resistance penetration in those elements by 4%, 8%, 12%, 16%, 20%.

Each point in Chromatic Fury also increases your resistances to physical, fire, cold, lightning and acid by 0.5%.
talents.name: Chromatic Fury

description: Psionic talents of the various horrors of the world.
name: horror techniques

talents.info_text:
A wall of slime oozes out from the caster with radius 1, increasing once every two turns to a maximum eventual radius of 7, 8, 9, 9, 10, doing 64, 88, 106, 121, 135 slime damage for 13, 15, 16, 17, 18 turns.

The damage and duration will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Slime Wave

talents.info_text:
Grab a target and drag it to your side, holding it down and strangling it for 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The grab will also deal 50, 68, 81, 93, 104 slime damage per turn.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Tentacle Grab

talents.info_text:
Spit slime at your target doing 112, 147, 173, 194, 213 nature damage and slowing it down by 30% for 3 turns.

The damage will increase with the Dexterity stat
talents.name: Ooze Spit

talents.info_text: You extend slimy roots into the ground, follow them, and re-appear somewhere else in a range of 6, 8, 9, 10, 11 with error margin of 1.
talents.name: Slime Roots

talents.info_text:
Blast a wave of water all around you with a radius of 2, 4, 5, 6, 7, making all creatures Wet for 10 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Drench

description: Learn to channel your mental power through mindstars, forming powerful psionic blades.
name: mindstar mastery

talents.info_text:
Channel your mental power through your wielded mindstars, generating psionic blades.

Mindstar psiblades have their damage modifiers (how much damage they gain from stats) multiplied by 1.49, 1.66, 1.79, 1.90, 1.99, their armour penetration by 1.30, 1.56, 1.77, 1.94, 2.09 and mindpower, willpower and cunning by 1.49, 1.66, 1.79, 1.90, 1.99.

Also increases Physical Power by 16, 32, 48, 64, 80 and increases weapon damage by 28%, 40%, 48%, 56%, 63% when using mindstars.
talents.name: Psiblades

talents.info_text:
You touch the target with your psiblade, bringing the forces of nature to bear on your foe.

Thorny vines will grab the target, slowing it by 18%, 20%, 22%, 24%, 26% and dealing 19, 25, 31, 35, 39 nature damage each turn for 10 turns.

Damage will increase with your Mindpower and Mindstar power (requires two mindstars, multiplier 1).
talents.name: Thorn Grab

talents.info_text:
Smash your psiblades into the ground, creating a tide of crystallized leaves circling you in a radius of 3 for 7 turns.

All foes hit by the leaves will start bleeding for 29, 38, 45, 50, 55 per turn (cumulative).

All allies hit will be covered in leaves, granting them 26%, 33%, 37%, 40%, 40% chance to completely avoid any damaging attack.

Damage and avoidance will increase with your Mindpower and Mindstar power (requires two mindstars, multiplier 1).
talents.name: Leaves Tide

talents.info_text:
You hit a foe with your mainhand psiblade doing 334%, 370%, 396%, 419%, 439% weapon damage, channeling all the damage done through your offhand psiblade with which you touch a friendly creature to heal it.

The maximum heal possible is 236, 303, 355, 400, 439. Equilibrium of the healed target will also decrease by 10% of the heal power.

Max heal will increase with your Mindpower and Mindstar power (requires two mindstars, multiplier 1).
talents.name: Nature's Equilibrium

description: You learn to control moss, making it grow at will to help you on the battlefield.
name: moss

talents.info_text:
Instantly grow a moss circle of radius 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 at your feet.

Each turn the moss deals 28, 38, 45, 52, 58 nature damage to each foe within its radius.

This moss is very thick and sticky causing all foes passing through it have their movement speed reduced by 42%, 52%, 60%, 65%, 69% and have a 29%, 38%, 45%, 50%, 55% chance to be pinned to the ground for 4 turns.

The moss lasts 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

Moss talents are instant but place all other moss talents on cooldown for 3 turns.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Grasping Moss

talents.info_text:
Instantly grow a moss circle of radius 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 at your feet.

Each turn the moss deals 28, 38, 45, 52, 58 nature damage to each foe within its radius.

This moss has vampiric properties and heals the user for 72%, 93%, 108%, 119%, 128% of the damage done.

The moss lasts 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

Moss talents are instant but place all other moss talents on cooldown for 3 turns.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Nourishing Moss

talents.info_text:
Instantly grow a moss circle of radius 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 at your feet.

Each turn the moss deals 28, 38, 45, 52, 58 nature damage to each foe within its radius.

This moss is very slippery and causes affected foes to have a 23%, 30%, 34%, 37%, 39% chance of failing to perform complex actions.

The moss lasts 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

Moss talents are instant but place all other moss talents on cooldown for 3 turns.

The damage and the chance to apply the slippery effect increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Slippery Moss

talents.info_text:
Instantly grow a moss circle of radius 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 at your feet.

Each turn the moss deals 28, 38, 45, 52, 58 nature damage to each foe within its radius.

This moss is coated with strange fluids and has a 30%, 40%, 47%, 53%, 58% chance to confuse (power 26%, 35%, 39%, 41%, 43%) foes passing through it for 2 turns.

The moss lasts 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

Moss talents are instant but place all other moss talents on cooldown for 3 turns.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Hallucinogenic Moss

description: Cover the floor with natural mucus.
name: mucus

talents.info_text:
For 4, 5, 6, 7, 7 turns, you lay down mucus where you walk or stand.

The mucus is placed automatically every turn and lasts 4, 5, 6, 7, 7 turns.

At talent level 4 or greater, the mucus will expand to a radius 1 area from where it is placed.

Your mucus will poison all foes crossing it, dealing 35, 48, 57, 66, 73 nature damage every turn for 5 turns (stacking).

In addition, each turn, you will restore 5.2, 7.1, 8.5, 9.8, 11 Equilibrium while in your own mucus, and other friendly creatures in your mucus will restore 1 Equilibrium both for you and for themselves.

The Poison damage and Equilibrium regeneration increase with your Mindpower, and laying down more mucus in the same spot will intensify its effects and refresh its duration.
talents.name: Mucus

talents.info_text:
Calling upon nature, you cause the ground to erupt in an radius 2, 2, 2, 3, 3 acidic explosion, dealing 163, 222, 268, 307, 341 acid damage to all creatures and creating mucus in the area.

Any Mucus Oozes you have active will, if in line of sight, instantly spit slime (at reduced power) at one of the targets hit by the splash.

The damage increases with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Acid Splash

talents.info_text:
Your mucus is brought to near sentience.

Each turn, there is a 32%, 35%, 37%, 38%, 39% chance that a random spot of your mucus will spawn a Mucus Ooze.

Mucus Oozes last 6, 8, 9, 10, 11 turns and will attack any of your foes by spitting slime at them.

You may have up to 1, 1, 3, 4, 5 Mucus Oozes active at any time (based on your Cunning).

Any time you deal a mental critical, the remaining time on all of your Mucus Oozes will increase by 2.

The spawn chance increases with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Living Mucus

talents.info_text:
You temporarily merge with your mucus, cleansing yourself of 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 physical or magical detrimental effects.

You can then reemerge on any tile within sight and range that is also covered by mucus.

This is quick, requiring only 100%, 60%, 41%, 31%, 25% of a turn to perform, but you must be in contact with your mucus.
talents.name: Oozewalk

description: Wild gifts of the various objects of the world.
name: object techniques

talents.info_text:
Call upon the power of nature to regenerate your body for 12, 19, 32, 44, 57 life every turn for 6 turns.

The life healed will increase with the Willpower stat.
talents.name: Bloom Heal

talents.info_text: The target has a 8% chance (stacking to a maximum of 51%, 62%, 69%, 74%, 77%) to fail to cast any spell. At level 2 magical effects may be disrupted, at level 3 magical sustains may be disrupted, and at level 5 magical constructs and undead may be stunned.
talents.name: Destroy Magic

talents.info_text:
You enter into a fighting trance, gaining 15%% resist all, losing 15 mindpower, but gaining 20 mental save. However, each turn after the fifth that this talent is active, there is a chance that you will be overcome and become confused.

This does not take a turn to use.
talents.name: Battle Trance

talents.info_text:
Instantly grow a moss circle of radius 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 at target area.

Each turn the moss deals 28, 38, 45, 52, 58 nature damage to each foe within its radius.

This moss is very thick and sticky causing all foes passing through it have their movement speed reduced by 42%, 52%, 60%, 65%, 69% and have a 29%, 38%, 45%, 50%, 55% chance to be pinned to the ground for 4 turns.

The moss lasts 5, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns.

Moss talents are instant but place all other moss talents on cooldown for 3 turns.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Overgrowth

description: Your body and internal organs are becoming more ooze-like in nature, allowing you to spawn more of you.
name: ooze

talents.info_text:
Your body is more like that of an ooze.

When you take damage, you may split and create a Bloated Ooze nearby within your line of sight.

This ooze has as much health as twice the damage you took (up to a maximum of 276, 377, 453, 515, 569, based on your Mindpower and maximum life).

The chance to split equals the percent of your health lost times 1.57, 1.72, 1.82, 1.89, 1.94.

You may have up to 1, 2, 3, 3, 3 Bloated Oozes active at any time (limited by talent level and the summoning limit), and all damage you take will be split equally between you and them so long as this talent is active.

Bloated Oozes last for 6, 8, 9, 10, 11 turns, are very resilient (17%, 24%, 29%, 33%, 36% all damage resistance to damage not coming through your shared link), and regenerate life quickly.

The chance to split increases with your Cunning.
talents.name: Mitosis

talents.info_text:
You randomly merge with an adjacent bloated ooze, granting you 40% all damage resistance for 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

This process releases a burst of antimagic, dealing 148, 201, 243, 278, 309 Manaburn damage in radius 3.

This talent allows you to restore 1.0, 1.4, 1.6, 1.8, 2.0 Equilibrium per turn while Mitosis is active.

The damage, duration and Equilibrium restoration increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Reabsorb

talents.info_text:
Instantly call all of your bloated oozes to your aid.

If you have less than the maximum number of oozes allowed by the Mitosis talent, up to 1 will be created with 37, 44, 49, 52, 55 life (51%, 62%, 69%, 74%, 77% of the maximum life allowed by Mitosis).

Each ooze created will form near a random foe in sight (no more than one ooze per target) and grab its attention.

This will then allow you to channel a melee attack through your ooze to its target, doing 132%, 158%, 177%, 194%, 209% weapon damage (as Acid).
talents.name: Call of the Ooze

talents.info_text:
Your body's internal organs are indistinct, disguising your vital areas.

All direct critical hits (physical, mental, spells) against you have a 21%, 35%, 48%, 60%, 71% lower Critical multiplier (but always do at least normal damage).

In addition you gain 35%, 58%, 69%, 75%, 79% resistance to disease, poison, wounds and blindness.
talents.name: Indiscernible Anatomy

description: You channel ooze through your psiblades.
name: oozing blades

talents.info_text:
Channel slime through your psiblades, extending their reach to create a beam doing 217, 296, 357, 409, 454 Slime damage.

The damage increases with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Oozebeam

talents.info_text:
You gain 27%, 37%, 45%, 52%, 57% Nature resistance.

When you deal Acid damage to a creature, you gain a 3.1%, 4.9%, 6.5%, 8.0%, 9.4% bonus to Nature damage for 2, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns.

This damage bonus will improve up to 4 times (no more than once each turn) with later Acid damage you do, up to a maximum of 6.8%, 11%, 15%, 18%, 21%.

The resistance and damage increase improve with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Natural Acid

talents.info_text:
You use your psiblades to fire a small worm at a foe.

When it hits, it will burrow into the target's brain and stay there for 6 turns, interfering with its ability to use talents.

Each time a talent is used there is 84%, 88%, 90%, 91%, 92% chance that 2, 2, 2, 3, 3 talent(s) are placed on a 5, 10, 12, 14, 15 turn(s) cooldown.

The chance will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Mind Parasite

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with natural forces, ignoring 23%, 38%, 48%, 56%, 61% nature resistance of your targets.

In addition, any time you deal damage with a wild gift there is a 32%, 57%, 68%, 75%, 79% chance that one of your mucus oozes will spit at the target as a free action.
talents.name: Unstoppable Nature

description: Talents of the various entities of the world.
name: other

talents.info_text: Summon allies.
talents.name: Summon

talents.info_text: You project thick black ink, blinding your targets for 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.
talents.name: Blinding Ink

talents.info_text:
Spit poison at your target, doing 246, 340, 412, 473, 526 poison damage over six turns.

The damage will increase with your Strength or Dexterity (whichever is higher).
talents.name: Spit Poison

talents.info_text:
Spit blight at your target doing 246, 340, 412, 473, 526 blight damage.

The damage will increase with your Magic.
talents.name: Spit Blight

talents.info_text:
Rushes toward your target with incredible speed. If the target is reached, you use your claws to pin it to the ground for 5 turns.

You must rush from at least 2 tiles away.
talents.message: @Source@ rushes out, claws sharp and ready!
talents.name: Rushing Claws

talents.info_text: Lay a concealed web under yourself, pinning all non-spiderkin that pass through it for 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.
talents.name: Lay Web

talents.info_text: Weave darkness (power 18, 35, 48, 59, 69) in a radius of 3, 4, 5, 5, 6, blocking all light but the most powerful and teleporting you a short range.
talents.name: Darkness

talents.info_text:
Throws a huge boulder at a target, damaging it for 153, 212, 257, 295, 328 and knocking it back 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 tiles.

The damage will increase with your Strength.
talents.name: Throw Boulder

talents.info_text: Howl (radius 6, 8, 9, 10, 11) to call your hunting pack.
talents.name: Howl

talents.info_text: Shriek (radius 6, 8, 9, 10, 11) to call your allies.
talents.name: Shriek

talents.info_text:
Sends a telekinetic attack, knocking back the target and doing 125, 170, 205, 234, 261 physical damage.

The damage will increase with Mindpower.
talents.name: Telekinetic Blast

talents.info_text: Invoke your tentacles on your victim.
talents.name: Invoke Tentacle

talents.info_text:
Imbues your body with natural energies, healing for 438, 583, 695, 790, 874 life.

The life healed will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Heal

talents.info_text:
Calls forth a powerful beam of lightning doing 88, 120, 145, 166, 184 to 264, 360, 434, 497, 553 lightning damage.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Call Lightning

talents.info_text:
Latch on to the target and suck their blood, doing 0.50, 5.00, 13, 20, 25 physical and 0.50, 5.00, 13, 20, 25 acid damage per turn.

After 5 turns of drinking, drop off and gain the ability to Multiply.

Damage scales with your level.
talents.message: @Source@ tries to latch on and suck blood!
talents.name: Blood Suckers

talents.info_text:
Spits a beam of slime doing 57, 78, 94, 107, 119 slime damage.

The damage will increase with mindpower.
talents.name: Slime Spit

talents.info_text:
Spits a bolt of fire, doing 87, 118, 143, 163, 182 fire damage.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Flamespit

talents.info_text:
A wave of fire emanates from you with radius 2, 4, 5, 6, 7, knocking back anything caught inside and setting them ablaze and doing 132, 180, 217, 249, 277 fire damage over 3 turns.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Flame Fury

talents.info_text:
Breathe acid on your foes, doing 160, 209, 246, 276, 302 damage.

The damage will increase with your Willpower.
talents.name: Acid Breath

talents.info_text:
Breathe lightning on your foes, doing 61, 79, 93, 105, 115 to 183, 239, 281, 315, 345 damage.

The damage will increase with your Willpower.
talents.name: Lightning Breath

talents.info_text:
Breathe poison on your foes, doing 170, 222, 260, 293, 320 damage over a few turns.

The damage will increase with your Willpower.
talents.name: Poison Breath

talents.info_text:
A furious ice storm rages around the user doing 51, 66, 78, 88, 96 cold damage in a radius of 3 each turn for 4 turns.

It has 25% chance to freeze damaged targets.

The damage and duration will increase with your Willpower.
talents.name: Winter's Fury

talents.info_text: Spread a web and throw it toward your target. If caught, it won't be able to move for 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.
talents.name: Web

talents.info_text:
Gaze at your foes and turn them to stone for 4, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns.

Stoned creatures are unable to act or regen life, and are very brittle.

If a stoned creature is hit by an attack that deals more than 30% of its life, it will shatter and be destroyed.

Stoned creatures are highly resistant to fire and lightning, and somewhat resistant to physical attacks.

This spell may fail against creatures resistant to being stunned, that are specifically immune to stoning, or certain bosses.
talents.name: Petrifying Gaze

talents.info_text:
Sting the target with your ovipositor, injecting 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 larvae into it to finish their hatching process.

Over a 5 turn gestation period, the larvae will feed on the victim internally, dealing 3.09, 6.08, 7.16, 11, 12 to 15, 30, 36, 54, 59 physical damage each turn (increasing as they grow).

After the gestation period is complete, each larva will rip itself free of its host, dealing 15, 20, 24, 27, 29 physical and 15, 20, 24, 27, 29 fire damage.
talents.name: Ritch Larva Infect

description: Take on the defining aspects of a Sand Drake.
name: sand drake aspect

talents.info_text:
Attack the target for 210%, 232%, 248%, 261%, 273% Nature weapon damage.

If the attack brings your target below 15%, 20%, 24%, 27%, 29% life or kills it, you can try to swallow it, killing it automatically and regaining life and equilibrium depending on its level.

The chance to swallow depends on your talent level and the relative size of the target.

Levels in Swallow additionally raises your Physical and Mental critical rate by 3%, 7%, 9%, 11%, 13%, passively.

Each point in sand drake talents also increases your physical resistance by 0.5%.
talents.name: Swallow

talents.info_text:
You slam the ground, shaking the area around you in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5.

Creatures caught by the quake will be damaged for 175%, 194%, 208%, 220%, 231% weapon damage, and knocked back up to 3 tiles away.

The terrain will also be moved around within the radius, and the user will be shifted to a random square within the radius.

Each point in sand drake talents also increases your physical resistance by 0.5%.
talents.name: Quake

talents.info_text:
Allows you to burrow into earthen walls for 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns.

Your powerful digging abilities also allow you to exploit and smash through enemy defensive weaknesses; You ignore 30, 37, 43, 48, 52 of target armor and 15%, 18%, 21%, 24%, 26% of enemy physical damage resistance while this is in effect.

At Talent Level 5, this talent can be used instantly, and the cooldown will reduce with levels.

Each point in sand drake talents also increases your physical resistance by 0.5%.
talents.name: Burrow

talents.info_text:
You breathe sand in a frontal cone of radius 5, 7, 8, 9, 10. Any target caught in the area will take 177, 231, 271, 304, 333 physical damage, and will be blinded for 3, 3, 3, 4, 4 turns.

The damage will increase with your Strength, and the critical chance is based on your Mental crit rate.

Each point in sand drake talents also increases your physical resistance by 0.5%.
talents.name: Sand Breath

description: Through dedicated consumption of slime mold juice, you have gained an affinity with slime molds.
name: slime

talents.info_text:
Spit slime at your target doing 186, 254, 306, 350, 389 nature damage and slowing it down by 30% for 3 turns.

The slime can bounce from foe to foe, hitting up to a total of 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 target(s).

Additional targets must be within 6 tiles of each other and the slime loses 48%, 44%, 40%, 37%, 35% damage per bounce.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower
talents.name: Slime Spit

talents.info_text:
Releases poisonous spores at an area of radius 1, 2, 2, 3, 3, infecting the foes inside with a random poison doing 296, 403, 486, 556, 618 Nature damage over 10 turns.

This attack can crit and deals 27%, 37%, 45%, 52%, 57% additional critical damage.

The damage and critical bonus increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Poisonous Spores

talents.info_text:
Your skin drips with acid, damaging all that hit you for 35, 48, 57, 66, 73 Acid damage.

The damage increases with your Mindpower.
talents.message: The skin of @Source@ starts dripping acid.
talents.name: Acidic Skin

talents.info_text:
You extend slimy roots into the ground, follow them, and re-appear somewhere else in a range of 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 with error margin of 3, 2, 1, 1, 1.

Doing so changes your internal structure slightly, taking 1, 1, 2, 2, 3 random talent(s) off cooldown.
talents.name: Slime Roots

description: Take on the defining aspects of a Storm Drake.
name: storm drake aspect

talents.info_text:
You transform into pure lightning, moving 520%, 636%, 737%, 831%, 918% faster for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 game turns.

Also provides 30% physical damage resistance and 100% lightning resistance.

Any actions other than moving will stop this effect.

Note: since you will be moving very fast, game turns will pass very slowly.

Levels in Lightning Speed additionally raises your Movement Speed by 13%, 27%, 38%, 48%, 58%, passively.

Each point in storm drake talents also increases your lightning resistance by 1%.
talents.name: Lightning Speed

talents.info_text:
Generate an electrical field around you in a radius of 2, 4, 5, 7, 8. Any creature caught inside will lose up to 31%, 38%, 42%, 45%, 47% of its current life (21%, 25%, 28%, 30%, 32% if the target is Elite or Rare, 16%, 19%, 21%, 23%, 24% if the target is a Unique or Boss, and 13%, 15%, 17%, 18%, 19% if they are an Elite Boss.). This life drain is irresistable, but can be saved against with physical save.

Additionally, it will deal 117, 159, 192, 220, 245 lightning damage afterwards, regardless of target rank.

Current life loss and lightning damage will increase with your Mindpower, and the lightning damage element can critically hit with mental critical chances.

Each point in storm drake talents also increases your lightning resistance by 1%.
talents.name: Static Field

talents.info_text:
Summons a tornado that moves slowly toward its target, following it if it changes position.

Any foe caught in its path takes 79, 108, 130, 149, 166 lightning damage.

When it reaches its target, it explodes in a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 for 140, 191, 230, 263, 293 lightning damage and 140, 191, 230, 263, 293 physical damage. All affected creatures will be knocked back, and the targeted creature will be stunned for 3, 4, 4, 5, 6 turns. The blast will ignore the talent user.

The tornado will last for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns, or until it reaches its target.

Damage will increase with your Mindpower, and the stun chance is based on your Mindpower vs target Physical Save.

Each point in storm drake talents also increases your lightning resistance by 1%.
talents.name: Tornado

talents.info_text:
You breathe lightning in a frontal cone of radius 5, 7, 8, 9, 10. Any target caught in the area will take 79, 104, 122, 136, 149 to 238, 311, 365, 409, 448 lightning damage, and have a 40%, 47%, 53%, 58%, 62% chance to be dazed for 3 turns.

The damage will increase with your Strength, and the critical chance is based on your Mental crit rate. The Daze chance is based on your Mindpower.

Each point in storm drake talents also increases your lightning resistance by 1%.
talents.name: Lightning Breath

description: The art of improving the quality of your summons.
name: summoning (advanced)

talents.info_text: Reduces the cooldown of all summons by 6%, 13%, 20%, 26%, 30%.
talents.name: Master Summoner

talents.info_text:
While Master Summoner is active, when a creature you summon appears in the world, it will trigger a wild effect:

  • Ritch Flamespitter: Reduce fire resistance of all foes in a radius
  • Hydra: Generates a cloud of lingering poison
  • Rimebark: Reduce cold resistance of all foes in a radius
  • Fire Drake: Appears with 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 fire drake hatchling(s)
  • War Hound: Reduce physical resistance of all foes in a radius
  • Jelly: Reduce nature resistance of all foes in a radius
  • Minotaur: Reduces movement speed of all foes in a radius
  • Stone Golem: Dazes all foes in a radius
  • Turtle: Heals all friendly targets in a radius
  • Spider: The spider is so hideous that foes around it are repelled

Radius for effects is 2, 3, 3, 4, 4, and the duration of each lasting effect is 5, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns.

The effects improve with your Willpower.
talents.name: Grand Arrival

talents.info_text:
While Master Summoner is active, each new summon will reduce the remaining cooldown of Rage, Detonate and Wild Summon.

54%, 78%, 100%, 100%, 100% chance to reduce them by 1, 2, 3, 3, 3.
talents.name: Nature's Cycle

talents.info_text:
For 1, 3, 4, 6, 7 turn(s), you have 100% chance that your summons appear as a wild version.

Each turn the chance disminishes.

Wild creatures have one more talent/power than the base versions:

  • Ritch Flamespitter: sends a blast of flames around it, knocking foes away
  • Hydra: Can disengage from melee range
  • Rimebark: Becomes more resistant to magic damage
  • Fire Drake: Can emit a powerful roar to silence its foes
  • War Hound: Can rage, inreasing its critical chance and armour penetration
  • Jelly: Can swallow foes that are low on life, regenerating your equilibrium
  • Minotaur: Can rush toward its target
  • Stone Golem: Melee blows can deal a small area of effect damage
  • Turtle: Can force all foes in a radius into melee range
  • Spider: Can project an insidious poison at its foes, reducing their healing

This talent requires Master Summoner to be active to be used.
talents.name: Wild Summon

description: The art of manipulating the lifespan and location of your summons.
name: summoning (augmentation)

talents.info_text: Induces a killing rage in one of your summons, increasing all its stats by 17, 24, 29, 33, 37 for 10 turns.
talents.name: Rage

talents.info_text:
Destroys one of your summons, making it detonate in radius of 4, 5, 6, 7, 8.

  • Ritch Flamespitter: Explodes into a fireball
  • Hydra: Explodes into a ball of lightning, acid or poison
  • Rimebark: Explodes into an iceball
  • Fire Drake: Generates a cloud of fire
  • War Hound: Explodes into a ball of physical damage
  • Jelly: Explodes into a ball of slowing slime
  • Minotaur: Explodes into a sharp ball, cutting all creatures
  • Stone Golem: Knocks back all creatures
  • Turtle: Grants a small shell shield to all friendly creatures
  • Spider: Pins all foes around

    • In addition, a random summon will come off cooldown.

    Hostile effects will not hit you or your other summons.

    The effects improve with your Willpower.
talents.name: Detonate

talents.info_text: Improves all your summons' Constitution by 3, 6, 9, 12, 14, and adds 1.6, 3.2, 4.8, 6.4, 8.0 effective talent levels to your summon talents to determine your summons' lifetime.
talents.name: Resilience

talents.info_text: Switches places with one of your summons. This disorients your foes, granting both you and your summon 50% evasion for 2, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns.
talents.name: Phase Summon

description: The art of calling creatures adept in elemental destruction to your aid.
name: summoning (distance)

talents.info_text:
Summon a Ritch Flamespitter for 7, 9, 9, 10, 11 turns to burn your foes to death. Flamespitters are really weak in melee and die easily, but they can burn your foes from afar.

It will get 83, 150, 208, 261, 311 Willpower, 73, 129, 179, 224, 267 Cunning and 10 Constitution.

Your summons inherit some of your stats: increased damage%, stun/pin/confusion/blindness resistance, armour penetration.

Their Willpower and Cunning will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Ritch Flamespitter

talents.info_text:
Summon a 3-headed Hydra for 7, 9, 9, 10, 11 turns to destroy your foes. 3-headed hydras are able to breathe poison, acid and lightning.

It will get 70, 123, 169, 212, 252 Willpower, 13, 16, 19, 22, 24 Constitution and 18 Strength.

Your summons inherit some of your stats: increased damage%, stun/pin/confusion/blindness resistance, armour penetration.

Their Willpower will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Hydra

talents.info_text:
Summon a Rimebark for 7, 9, 9, 10, 11 turns to harass your foes. Rimebarks cannot move, but they have a permanent ice storm around them, damaging and freezing anything coming close in a radius of 3.

It will get 83, 150, 208, 261, 311 Willpower, 70, 123, 169, 212, 252 Cunning and 10 Constitution.

Your summons inherit some of your stats: increased damage%, stun/pin/confusion/blindness resistance, armour penetration.

Their Willpower and Cunning will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Rimebark

talents.info_text:
Summon a Fire Drake for 4, 6, 6, 7, 8 turns to burn and crush your foes to death. Fire Drakes are behemoths that can burn your foes from afar with their fiery breath.

It will get 83, 150, 208, 261, 311 Strength, 71, 121, 164, 204, 242 Constitution and 38 Willpower.

Your summons inherit some of your stats: increased damage%, stun/pin/confusion/blindness resistance, armour penetration.

Their Strength and Constitution will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Fire Drake

description: The art of calling creatures adept in melee combat to your aid.
name: summoning (melee)

talents.info_text:
Summon a War Hound for 7, 9, 9, 10, 11 turns to attack your foes. War hounds are good basic melee attackers.

It will get 87, 156, 217, 273, 326 Strength, 87, 156, 217, 273, 326 Dexterity and 15 Constitution.

Your summons inherit some of your stats: increased damage%, stun/pin/confusion/blindness resistance, armour penetration.

Their Strength and Dexterity will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: War Hound

talents.info_text:
Summon a Jelly for 7, 9, 9, 10, 11 turns to attack your foes. Jellies do not move, but your equilibrium will be reduced by 10% of all damage received by the jelly.

It will get 71, 131, 183, 231, 276 Constitution and 13, 16, 19, 22, 24 Strength.

Your summons inherit some of your stats: increased damage%, stun/pin/confusion/blindness resistance, armour penetration.

Their Constitution stat will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Jelly

talents.info_text:
Summon a Minotaur for 4, 6, 6, 7, 8 turns to attack your foes. Minotaurs cannot stay summoned for long, but they deal a lot of damage.

It will get 100, 173, 237, 296, 351 Strength, 13, 16, 19, 22, 24 Constitution and 75, 138, 193, 244, 291 Dexterity.

Your summons inherit some of your stats: increased damage%, stun/pin/confusion/blindness resistance, armour penetration.

Their Strength and Dexterity will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Minotaur

talents.info_text:
Summon a Stone Golem for 7, 9, 9, 10, 11 turns to attack your foes. Stone golems are formidable foes that can become unstoppable.

It will get 87, 156, 217, 273, 326 Strength, 13, 16, 19, 22, 24 Constitution and 83, 150, 208, 261, 311 Dexterity.

Your summons inherit some of your stats: increased damage%, stun/pin/confusion/blindness resistance, armour penetration.

Their Strength and Dexterity will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Stone Golem

description: The art of calling versatile creatures to your aid.
name: summoning (utility)

talents.info_text:
Summon a Turtle for 7, 9, 9, 10, 11 turns to distract your foes. Turtles are resilient, but not very powerful. However, they will periodically force any foes to attack them, and can protect themselves with their shell.

It will get 87, 156, 217, 273, 326 Constitution, 13, 16, 19, 22, 24 Dexterity and 18 willpower.

Your summons inherit some of your stats: increased damage%, stun/pin/confusion/blindness resistance, armour penetration.

Their Constitution will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Turtle

talents.info_text:
Summon a Spider for 7, 9, 9, 10, 11 turns to harass your foes. Spiders can poison your foes and throw webs to pin them to the ground.

It will get 83, 150, 208, 261, 311 Dexterity, 13, 16, 19, 22, 24 Strength, 18 Willpower and 10 Constitution.

Your summons inherit some of your stats: increased damage%, stun/pin/confusion/blindness resistance, armour penetration.

Their Dexterity will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Spider

talents.info_text:
You focus yourself on nature, allowing you to summon creatures much faster (57%, 35%, 25%, 20%, 16% of a normal summon time) and with no chance to fail from high equilibrium for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns.

When activating this power, a random summoning talent will come off cooldown.

Each time you summon, the duration of the frantic summoning effect will reduce by 1.
talents.name: Frantic Summoning

talents.info_text:
Allows you to take direct control of any of your summons.

The summons will appear on the interface; a simple click on them will let you switch control.

You can also press control+tab to switch.

When taking control, your summon has its lifetime increased by 7, 12, 16, 19, 22 turns, and it takes 9%, 17%, 24%, 30%, 35% less damage.

The damage reduction is based on your Cunning.
talents.name: Summon Control

description: Take on the defining aspects of a Venom Drake.
name: venom drake aspect

talents.info_text:
Spray forth a glob of acidic moisture at your enemy.

The target will take 186, 254, 306, 350, 389 Mindpower-based acid damage.

Enemies struck have a 25% chance to be Disarmed for three turns, as their weapon is rendered useless by an acid coating.

At Talent Level 5, this becomes a piercing line of acid.

Every level in Acidic Spray additionally raises your Mindpower by 4, passively.

Each point in acid drake talents also increases your acid resistance by 1%.
talents.name: Acidic Spray

talents.info_text:
Exhale a mist of lingering acid, dealing 50, 68, 81, 93, 104 acid damage that can critical in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 each turn for 6, 6, 7, 7, 7 turns.

Enemies in this mist will be corroded for 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 turns, lowering their Accuracy, their Armour and their Defense by 13, 18, 22, 25, 28.

The damage and duration will increase with your Mindpower, and the radius will increase with talent level.

Each point in acid drake talents also increases your acid resistance by 1%.
talents.name: Corrosive Mist

talents.info_text:
You strike the enemy with a rain of fast, acidic blows. You strike four times for pure acid damage. Every blow does 38%, 50%, 58%, 66%, 73% damage.

Every two talent levels, one of your strikes becomes blinding acid instead of normal acid, blinding the target 25% of the time if it hits.

Each point in acid drake talents also increases your acid resistance by 1%.
talents.name: Dissolve

talents.info_text:
You breathe acid in a frontal cone of radius 5, 7, 8, 9, 10. Any target caught in the area will take 190, 248, 291, 327, 358 acid damage.

Enemies caught in the acid have a 40%, 47%, 53%, 58%, 62% chance of their weapons becoming useless for three turns.

The damage will increase with your Strength, and the critical chance is based on your Mental crit rate. The Disarm chance is based on your Mindpower.

Each point in acid drake talents also increases your acid resistance by 1%.
talents.name: Corrosive Breath
